A film of contradictions and agreements.","poster_path":"/AjgQQsO9e1R9fU0wepy6OASuaVt.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[35,14],"popularity":8.993,"release_date":"1924-12-04","video":false,"vote_average":7.0,"vote_count":129},{"backdrop_path":"/moyP2UVY4WPI6Y051dPqoxCYua2.jpg","id":27040,"title":"Meshes of the Afternoon","original_title":"Meshes of the Afternoon","overview":"A woman returning home falls asleep and has vivid dreams that may or may not be happening in reality. Although the production contains some fictional elements, it vividly shows how its resourceful subjects survive in such a harsh climate, revealing how they construct their igloo homes and find food by hunting and fishing. The film also captures the beautiful, if unforgiving, frozen landscape of the Great White North, far removed from conventional civilization.","poster_path":"/9WAboi1QbKu41WkyGxQVNpXwwxx.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"en","genre_ids":[99,18],"popularity":19.885,"release_date":"1922-06-11","video":false,"vote_average":7.109,"vote_count":288},{"backdrop_path":"/ujaUJzloLboGsFSQfo8QZrnHMCQ.jpg","id":234,"title":"The Cabinet of Dr. Caligari","original_title":"Das Cabinet des Dr. Caligari","overview":"Francis, a young man, recalls in his memory the horrible experiences he and his fiancée Jane recently went through. But when one of her clients grows possessive, she must try to go back to her normal life.","poster_path":"/iUAFECovwPA0cVV9bo4uNGLJSGL.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"fr","genre_ids":[18,10749],"popularity":23.227,"release_date":"1967-05-24","video":false,"vote_average":7.381,"vote_count":850},{"backdrop_path":"/byRNEm1QwfQC1Mn0K4gLM2fIfWO.jpg","id":26317,"title":"Man with a Movie Camera","original_title":"Человек с киноаппаратом","overview":"A cameraman wanders around with a camera slung over his shoulder, documenting urban life with dazzling inventiveness.","poster_path":"/vJgAdgJWX54v0oXfIvhwjlZnmgn.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"ru","genre_ids":[99],"popularity":23.048,"release_date":"1929-05-12","video":false,"vote_average":7.854,"vote_count":699},{"backdrop_path":"/vRRnLUJpwPyPd8W0GrFpmHBnc9R.jpg","id":4497,"title":"Viridiana","original_title":"Viridiana","overview":"Viridiana is preparing to start her life as a nun when she is sent, somewhat unwillingly, to visit her aging uncle, Don Jaime. He supports her; but the two have met only once. Jaime thinks Viridiana resembles his dead wife. Viridiana has secretly despised this man all her life and finds her worst fears proven when Jaime grows determined to seduce his pure niece. Viridiana becomes undone as her uncle upends the plans she had made to join the convent.","poster_path":"/yFnUCrPY3ffjkqOkOupLro3sO7X.jpg","media_type":"movie","adult":false,"original_language":"es","genre_ids":[18],"popularity":18.836,"release_date":"1962-04-01","video":false,"vote_average":7.643,"vote_count":491},{"backdrop_path":"/3nrhN1V5YVdYAkzLfYSQCkqxEre.jpg","id":13913,"title":"Animal Crackers","original_title":"Animal Crackers","overview":"The well-known explorer and hunter Captain Spaulding has just returned from Africa, and is being welcomed home with a lavish party at the estate of influential society matron Mrs. Rittenhouse when a valuable painting goes missing. Since nobody else wants the job, they send prisoners to defend the mining station. Among them undercover agent Stone, who shall clear the whereabouts of the expensive robots.
